mdException.name: gov.geoplatform.uasdm.bus.InvalidMetadataFilenameException
mdException.label: Invalid Metadata Filename
mdException.description: Thrown when a user uploads a bad metadata filename.
mdException.message: Invalid metadata file name. No spaces or special characters such as <, >, -, +, =, !, @, #, $, %, ^, &, *, ?,/, \ or apostrophes are allowed. Additionally the filename must end in _uasmeta.xml
